name: Perspective Puzzle
description:
This is a procedurally generated puzzle experiment. I try to carve a path inside a grid of 3D cubes and show with othographic projection so it looks like 2D. 

The goal of this game is simple, you need to navigate the green circle until it touching the red circle.

There are 3 main screen which is connected each other

You can adjust the grid size anytime at the top right screen
